parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: (string) Databricks account ID of any type. For non-E2 account types, get your account ID from the

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

workspace_id.description: The workspace ID of the workspace in which the usage dashboard is created.

dashboard_type.description: Workspace level usage dashboard shows usage data for the specified workspace ID. Global level usage dashboard shows usage data for all workspaces in the account.

post.description: Create a usage dashboard specified by workspaceId, accountId, and dashboard type.
